menus

Class ShopButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.Rectangle
          • menus.ShopButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ShopButton
extends java.awt.Rectangle
    This class is made to be used during the Shop processing. (GameState = 0) Each ShopButton contains a picture of the element to which it refers in the Shop menu. Each button has a boolean "selected" if it's True then the button needs to be shown in a bigger size (Selected Item would be drawn instead of item) The class is inherited from Rectangle class to be able to use the related methods regarding size and position.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
